trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위한 메서드를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The PluralizationService class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: PluralizationService 클래스는 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> 지정된 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> 에 해당 하는 언어 규칙을 적용 하는

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>클래스 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태에 대 한 적용 되는 언어 규칙에 해당 하는.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 새로 만든 <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> culture.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> 문화권입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>클래스 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
trans-unit.target: 단 수 및 복수에 적용할 규칙 언어를 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is plural.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 단어 복수형 인지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>클래스 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다는 <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>및 <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>메서드에서 반환할 수 `true` 동일한 단어에 대 한.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: 두 메서드는 반환 하는 예를 들어 `true` "fish" 이라는 단어에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: 분석할 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is plural; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>단어가 복수형; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is singular.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 단어의 단 수 있는지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>클래스 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다는 <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>및 <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>메서드에서 반환할 수 `true` 동일한 단어에 대 한.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: 두 메서드는 반환 하는 예를 들어 `true` "fish" 이라는 단어에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: 분석할 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is singular; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>단어가 단 수 있으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the plural form of the specified word
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 단어의 복수 형태가 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>클래스 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: The word to be made plural.
trans-unit.target: 복수로 만들 단어입니다.

trans-unit.source: The plural form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 복수 형태의 입력된 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 단어의 단 수 형태를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>클래스 단어의 단 수 및 복수 형태를 생성 하기 위해 영어 규칙을 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>클래스</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> 에서</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> 사용 하 여 다른 언어에 서비스를 확장 하려면

trans-unit.source: The word to be made singular.
trans-unit.target: 단 수로 만들 단어입니다.

trans-unit.source: The singular form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 단 수 형태의 입력된 매개 변수입니다.
